001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn;
002
003public interface NeuronVisitor {
004
005    default void enterNetwork(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork) {
006    }
007
008    default void exitNetwork(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork) {
009    }
010
011    default void enterLayer(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork, int layerIndex) {
012    }
013
014    default void exitLayer(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork, int layerIndex) {
015    }
016
017    default void visitNeuron(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork, Neuron neuron, int layerIndex, int neuronIndex) {
018    }
019
020    default void visitConnection(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork, Neuron source, int fromLayer, int fromIndex,
021                                 Neuron target, int toLayer, int toIndex, float weight) {
022    }
023
024}
